_sText:
-==READ EVERYTHING PLEASE==-

IMPORTANT FOR ADMINS: 4way_spacetunnel is a BIG map. If you want people to be able to download the map directly from your server, you must use this command:

net_maxfilesize 52

Default 16mb. 4way_spacetunnel is 49.7mb.

Without this command changed to 52, people will not be able to download it and will get an error message like "Map zm_4way_spacetunnel_idm_v2.bsp is missing". 

----->If your server BZIPs the map you're ok.

Map Information:

Filesize: 49.7 mb 
Spawnpoints: 72 
Special Features: 1 spaceships, no fall damage 
Custom Textures Used: yes
Custom Sounds Used: yes

INSTALLATION:

Copy the cstrike folder into your "".../steam/steamapps/username/counter-strike source/" folder. Click yes to all and you're done.


A couple of features:
- No fall damage!
- New elevators
- New buildings.
- Well balanced spots, not impossible for zombies though not too easy.
- Totally retextured.! Lot's of custom textures used,
- 72 (!) spawn points for big servers
- Much bigger spawn area
- Advanced Teleporters (make the map faster)
- New elevator system instead of the old crane

* And much much more.


PS. I used the old screenshots from v1 ;)
